ParameterMap.H

00001 #ifndef PARAMETERMAP_H
00002 #define PARAMETERMAP_H
00003 
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <map>
00006 #include <sstream>
00007 
00008 #include "FunctionParameter.H"
00009 #include "Log.H"
00010 
00012 
00016 class ParameterMap : public std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> {
00017 public:
00018     ParameterMap(): std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> () { }
00020     template<typename T1> ParameterMap(const std::string &_name1,
00021                                        const T1 &_value1):
00022             std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *> () {
00023         insertByValue(_name1, _value1);
00024     }
00025     ~ParameterMap() { }
00027     template <typename T> void insertByValue(const std::string _name,
00028                                              const T &_value) {
00029         insert(
00030                 std::make_pair(_name,
00031                     ParameterFactory::Instance().
00032                             createParameterWithValue(_name, _value)));
00033         }
00035     template <typename T> void insertByDefault(const std::string _name,
00036                                                const T &_default) {
00037             insert(
00038                 std::make_pair(_name,
00039                     ParameterFactory::Instance().
00040                             createParameterWithDefault(_name, _default)));
00041         }
00043     std::string print() const {
00044         std::ostringstream o;
00045         o << "[\n";
00046         for (std::map<std::string, FunctionParameter *>::const_iterator i = begin();
00047              i != end(); ++i) {
00048                 o << "    " << i->first << ": \t"
00049                   << i->second->getName() << " = ";
00050                 // try casting to every known type, only print if cast succeeds
00051                 try {
00052                     o << "(double)" << double(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00053                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00054                 try {
00055                     o << "(unsigned)" << unsigned(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00056                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00057                 try {
00058                     o << "(int)" << int(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00059                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00060                 try {
00061                     o << "(string)" << std::string(*(i->second)) << std::endl;
00062                 }  catch (FunctionParameterValueBase::WrongParameterTypeException &e) { }
00063         }
00064         o << "]" << std::endl << std::ends;
00065 
00066         return o.str();
00067     }
00068 
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif
